title: Ticket #7392: Update link to GSI documentation
description:
The GSI Authentication section of the manual (https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/latest/admin-manual/security.html#gsi-authentication) links to http://www.globus.org/ to provide an intro to the concepts of GSI.

Globus has deprecated GSI and it's hard to find documentation about it on their site. We should link to the GCT (the community-supported Globus Toolkit fork) docs on GSI at https://gridcf.org/gct-docs/latest/gsic/key/index.html
check_ins: 2019-Dec-17 21:12   Check-in [58700]: (#7392) Update link to GSI documentation (By Tim Theisen )
creator: matyas
